'''Driftmark''' is an island in [[Blackwater Bay]] near [[Dragonstone]]. It is the seat of [[House Velaryon]].<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
sections.History:
===[[Season 1]]===
''[[The Lineages and Histories of the Great Houses of the Seven Kingdoms]]'' mentions that the firstborn son of [[Orys Baratheon]] married [[Monica Velaryon]] at Driftmark when he was seventeen.<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
